entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 6:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: W 25 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20 except minus 24 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 except minus 24 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
